record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2169
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2169 -- (House of Representatives - September 17, 2008)

[Page: H8354]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove Congressman Rick Larsen from H.R. 2169, the Clean Water Protection Act.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New Jersey?
